column1: People often comment on my skin and ask me what I use. I am so in love with this product that I give it as gifts to my family and friends. I use it morning and night and ALWAYS put it on when I travel by plane as the recirculated air can be so drying.

I have used Neutrogena products for over 10 years and my skin has never looked better. The Hydro Boost feels wonderful on my skin and when I wake up, my skin is still soft. Highly recommend this product, the facial wipes, and daily moisturizer with SPF.

I started giving up on finding the perfect moistureizer for my combo skin. The lotions just made my face more oily. Once i found Neutrogena's Hydro Boost Water Gel, i never looked back. It sinks into the skin like nothing i have ever seen. It is a great follow up to their Retin Oil.
I have been buying this product for over a year. Go on so smooth, and refreshing. Keeps my skin soft and have noticed other companies starting to copy. I'm staying with Neutrogena.

My friend swore by this water gel and at first, I was skeptical of the price (I'm usually cheap!) but this is SO WORTH IT. The water gel is like an instant cool splash and makes my skin so soft and happy.
I love this! This is my 5th jar and I use it in the morning under my make up. It goes on easily and dries quickly, so I can apply my powder make-up without any problems and off I go!

Like the texture of this water-gel, it's very light. My face feels smooth right after it. Good moisturizer for it's cost. I have sensitive skin and it's combination (oily, dry, normal) so it doesn't make my face oily, but to cover my dry spots I use also cream - gel from Neutrogena. So works great for me...

This cream did not irritate my sensitive skin. However, it smells perfumy and gave me an instant headache. Why do manufacturers have to put fragrance in face creams? I feel bad writing a not-so-good review, but I can't stand the smell.Sorry!
I bought this 2 weeks ago, and I'm very happy with this product so far. It keeps my face hydrated and it gives out great smell
I have been using the Hydro Boost Water Gel for two years, I love that it feels so light, not greasy.

I have oily skin and I was never 100 percent happy with my previous facial moisturisers because they never seemed to absorb the way I would like and just sat heavy on my skin. Finally this moisturiser feels amazing! It absorbs nicely and feels refreshing. I'm on my third round of this stuff, love it!

I just bought my second container of the Hydro Boost Water Gel. The first container lasted a long time, I think 6 months or more. I love the gel consistency, it feels cool and soothing on the skin and absorbs more quickly than cream-based moisturizers. I typically use it at night on my face and neck after toner & serums. I always apply this gel around my eyes as well and haven't experienced any irritation at all. My face always feels smooth, supple, and hydrated after using it!

I purchased the Hydro Boost Water Gel because my skin reacts badly to thick lotions and I don't like strong smelling creams or lotions I am very sensitive to a lot of things so I tried some and it was like putting water on my face with no heavy scent and my face is so soft and fresh looking and I'm 54 my daughter also uses this product and she 29

I bought this product because I tried a different water-based moisturized and loved it. I have used other Neutrogena products and loved them. Unfortunately, I have to use a ton of this product to get the minimum desired results. When I used the recommended amount my skin was still dry looking. I do not have dry skin so I was surprised. I was a little disappointed.

I've been using this product for about 9 months and am very pleased with the way it keeps my face hydrated and soft throughout the day. My skin is very dry and I am a wrinkled senior. I used to have dry cracked patches that were painful, no matter how much moisturizer I used, but no longer have that problem since I started using this product..

This product did not work well for my sensitive skin. As soon as I applied it (after getting out of the shower) it burned my face. Once it calmed down, it felt fine. A few hours later, I noticed that my skin was extremely dry and flaky. Not a good fit for me, despite the wonderful reviews I read before purchasing.

My dermatologist recommended Neutrogena Hydraboost Water Gel, and I'm certainly glad she did. It absorbs completely and leaves my 72-year old complexion looking years younger! My skin is soft, moisturized, and radiant. Living in the desert, maintaining moisture in my skin is crucial. This product really delivers! People say I look at least 20 years younger than the calendar indicates. I'm SOLD.

This product makes your skin feel like new! Both of my daughters love it and now one of their boyfriends use it too. Each person has different skin issues and the water boost doesn't cause any additional problems but rather hydrates the skin while making it feel so good.

I love the hydro water gel, I've been looking for a moisturizer that doesn't break out my face and moisturize it. And this definitely works for me. My face is less dry and doesn't break out from it. Most moisturizers are too heavy and this is light and your skin soaks it up perfectly. Will never buy anything else!

I looooove this water gel! It leaves my skin feeling so smooth and moisturized! Plus it smells amazing! It's like luxury on my face. One problem I have is that even though it says it has hyaluronic acid on it, it doesn't say that I'm the ingredients. Either way, very nice moisturizer! I recommend!
I loved this gel ! It made my skin smooth and more like baby skin
I have been using this for several months and my skin is so hydrated. I give it as gifts.
I have been using this product for years and love it.
Been using this product for over a year and like it very much.

I bought this product like 2 days ago and I didn't that I was going to see the positive effects that early like it is amazing it smells good and it makes my face feel smooth and healthy I am literally a huge fan of Neutrogena's skin care products and I would love to review this on Snapchat as well

I've been looking for a water based moisturizer and I usually use a SPF based moisturizer but I heard about Hydro Boost and it's all the rage right now so I decided to check it out and I honestly don't regret it at all. After the first few uses, I noticed a significant difference. My skin feels smooth and hydrated! 11/10 recommend.

At first I had to use it everyday, now I only use it every other day !!!!! I don't even need it every single day because it is so hydrating . Coming from someone with super dry skin, I was shocked by the results —- I've tries more expensive, name brand products and they didn't come close to this . Thanks neutrogena!
I am very glad I bought the serum and gel. The two pair nice together and so far seem to be solving my skin issues.
The Hydro Boost Water Gel is a product that I love and buy often because it helps balance my oily/combination skin. And it smells great! It also pairs well underneath makeup.

I have been using this product for several months now and I would not change it for the world. When I started to use it my face was peeling and I have not had an issue since. Smells and feels great on my skin.

I have been purchasing expencive lotions till I got hydro boost now my mom who is 78and my daughter who is 22 are alway looking to see if I have hydro boost for them to use. Love this stuff can't live without it thank you for making this line
My skin is very dry despite daily use of moisturizer and sunscreen. Since using Hydro Boost before bed, my skin glows as well as feeling so great, supple and smooth, not like I'm going to crack.
I wanted a light weight moisturizer for the summer months and stumbled across Hydro Boost and love it. It does not weigh your skin down like many moisturizers. Glad I came across it. Great product.

I've been using this for almost 3 weeks... I'm very pleased with the results and I'm 70 years old. My skin is smooth n supple as Neutrogena promised it would be. Thank you Neutrogena! And its affordable too!
I have been using this product for a couple of years and I love it. It's so cool and soothing for my face. And it's moisturizing without being heavy or greasy, which is a plus for my oily skin.
I purchased the face, hand and body gels. All work great and they're not greasy like other products I've tried. My dermatologist recommended the face gel and I'm glad I tried it!

Bought this product when I tried the serum, and I honestly love it just as much as the serum. It smells nice and is super hydrating. Most importantly to me, it doesn't irritate my sensitive skin! I use it every morning before I apply a BB cream!
I bought this about a week ago and so far so good. It smells really nice and it definitely hydrates my skin without being oily. I love it. Makes my skin feel good.

Smells great and dries quickly without leaving oily residue. My skin cleared up, not sure if it was because of this product or the Healthy Skin Boosters Facial Cleanser. I've been using both and they both work and smell great!
I've been using this product for a little over a week. I find that this cream is light as a feather, penetrates almost immediately, and keeps my skin moist for hours. Light fragrance, too.

I have been using Hydro Boost water gel for almost a year now after using several other age/wrinkle creams and this one actually shows me the positive reduction of lines and wrinkles!! I love it! I am going to try the other hydro boost products.

So happy with the results of Hydro Boost Water Gel, the cleanser and the cream. Unbeatable combination for fine lines and not so fine lines! Makes my skin look Young and healthy. Thank you Neutrogena!

I have been using this product for 4 months now and I can really tell a difference in my skin. It is hydrated and silky soft. I love the way this melts into my skin and feels cool and refreshing. Everyone should be using hydro boost gel.
tried many other products over the years, keep returning to Neutrogena due to its performance. Have very sensitive and dry skin as well as age related issues, Neutrogena delivers!

I have been using this product since it first came out. It is refreshing, hydrating and is also a great base before your morning and nighttime beauty regime. I am addicted and cannot function when I have run out. Seriously the best product ever.
I bought this because I am 68 and need a little hydration in my neck and face areas. I recently lost 25 lbs and needed the extra boost. This is a great product and it really helps!

I have been using this product about six months. I visited my aesthetician last week and she was raving about my “new” skin. She commented on the decrease in fine lines, no more dryness, and how supple my skin was. I noticed all of this too, but also noticed many of my “not so fine lines” decreased. I am a forever customer .❤️ Did I mention I am 70 years old? I have great genes. Thank you Mother!

Two words: Hyaluronic acid. Dry skins best friend. This water gel has changed my life. The dimethicone in it makes it great to wear under makeup as it really smooths everything out. I don't have acne prone skin but if you do this might not be the product for you. If you do have skin that tends to be on the dry side then you won't regret it.

WOW! About a month ago, I got this moisturizer and have been using it almost every night. I take off my makeup, rub witch hazel over my face, and top it off with the hydro-boost gel. My skin has never looked and felt softer, or healthier. 110% recommend this product to anyone, no matter your skin type!

I have oily skin and this is the PERFECT moisturizer for me. When my skin is not hydrated, it produces even more oil and this keeps it so happy. It never leaves my skin looking greasy. I tried a bunch of other products similar to this with eco friendly packaging (not a fan that this comes in a plastic container), but nothing was the same
I love how this hydrates your skin without every being oily!

its 2019 in Chicago...THIS STUFF IS GREAT!!!! my skin looks dewy and fresh ALL DAY!!!! I have the one with sunscreen and the booster!!! of course its Nuetrogena!!! the mascara I bought with it was terrible-Ive NEVER been happy with mascara from this company but...they are known for skin care so...idk.
I love the fresh scent and how easily it smooths on.
This is the best moisturizer I have ever used and im 46 years old.
I have such dry skin and I tried the Hydro Boost Series and Love everything that I have tried so far!!
I bought a few weeks ago along with the cleanser and lip treatment. My skin feels tight, not supple and soft.
I've been using the product for a week now and I'm very happy. It's hydrating, but very light and absorbs quickly.
I really believe this product has help my skin. I put in on my neck and face am and pm. No turkey neck for me. My husband even uses it.
I bought this a month ago. My skin in moisturized and looks young and dewy. I am a young looking 65 year old.
I have been using for a year and love how it makes my face and neck feel. Great gift for friends and family.
Light and moist. Just the right about of moisture and never feels greasy or heavy. Dries quickly so you can do make-up soon after application.
This product is exactly what I needed. It absorbs instantly, leaves my face feeling soft and smooth, and never feels greasy.

My face is so happy I made the switch , it's seems little greasy at first but then it dries and it's like magic my skin feels soft and hydrated. I'm glad they came out with the whole line for the body too

I've always struggled with skin on the drier side and I've used many different types of moisturizers from Clinque to Murad to Drunk Elephant, but I must say this is the best Moisturizer for dry skin! My skin has ever felt so soft and hydrated in my life! Everytime I use a moisturizer for dry skin, my skin ends up becoming too oily and I start to produce pimples and blackheads. However, this moisturizer gives me the perfect amount of hydration while keeping me clean and acne free!

I finally found a product that really worked on my extremely dry, flaking skin, Hydro Boost Body Gel Cream. I could not believe how soft my skin became. Glad I saw this advertised and will definitely stay with this product.
I love this gel formula it absorbs quickly, not greasy and my skin feels hydrated. I have oily skin and this just works. You should try it if you haven't yet.

I have been using Hydro-Boost Gel for quite some time. FINALLY, a moisturizing product without oil! My face doesn't flake any more! It goes on smoothly, is refreshing, and hydrates my aging skin well. Thanks, Neutrogena!

I started using this face gel around the time when it first came out and have probably bought over 10 jars since!! It feels so lightweight and non-sticky which means a lot since I have a problem with using lotions. Also doesn't make me itchy or breakout. I would recommend this to everyone!!

I love the product and I am using it for quite a while now. I am in my fifties and need hydration and smoothing out wrinkles. Great great product. I just wish the packaging and the container could be changed to a more eco-friendly version because it will y stopme to continue buying it.

This product caused me to break out and I'm not sure why. I wanted to like this product so bad because I am a huge fan of the sheet masks. Now I have a large jar of this product just sitting under my sink. This is not a good product for sensitive skin... it feels really hydrating but wishing 48 hours you will begin to break out. I've tried this product 5 times because I really wanted to love it.

This has got to be the best discovery for me this year. I have gotten to a point in my life where I need to take care of myself more than I am used to. I have combination type skin; I was looking for a moisturizer that was fast absorbing and non greasy feeling. This is my best friend in the mornings when I'm getting ready for work, and it performs exceptionally well the whole day in keeping my skin in tact. Definitely recommend to anyone with a similar situation, definitely worth every penny.

I have been using this for a year now and it's definately the best moisturizer I've ever used. I have tried MANY different kinds ranging from drug store brand, department store, dermatologist..you name it! This moisturizer is so light and makes my skin feels so soft afterwards. It smells great too! I recommend this product and the whole hydroboost line to everyone I know. I'm 34 now and feel like I have my perfect teenage skin back again.

I personally love this moisturizer! My skin is so dry, and this hydrating gel is just what it needs. Even with my slightly acne prone skin, I've never had any problems with this product! I've been buying it for years now, and plan to keep on buying it!

I purchased this product when Neutrogena first revealed it to the public. Oh, my word!!!! Best moisturizer ever!!! I have super oily skin every thing I have tried in the past either caused breakouts or caused my skin to be even oilier. So I decided I had nothing to loose by trying this product, it was and has been the best decision ever made!!! Please please please do not change this product formula or stop marketing it... it's my holy grail!! Way to go Neutrogena!!!
Super happy with my purchase ! My skin looks so hydrated :)
Made me feel like domeone had stretched plastic wrap over my face! Burned my eyelids too.
I love the water gel finally I found something that doesn't make my face itchy thank you.
Finally tried this and it's is so worth the money...
I love this cream and buy the sunscreen for first time and is the best!
I bought this long time ago and keep using, shared with my mom and she likes it too.
The product is fine but I was surprised there was no inner seal when I opened jar.
The fact that I bought five should tell you all you need to know.
I bought this product a few months ago and won't stop reordering!
This is very hydrating. I used Retin-A and this hydrates my dry skin very well.
It recommends the new product, one of my new favorites.
This is great. Not too greasy. Applies evenly and my skin feels so soft.
I like the soft feel on my face , not drying , last through the day
its good but need long time to absorb，im oily skin
The nongreasy feel and good performance is a plus. I will buy this again for dry winter days

I was trying out another product for about a month but stopped using because i noticed my skin, especially around my cheek area got super dry. I then switched to the hydro boost cleanser and water gel. I'm not even kidding when I say my skin changed overnight!! I would definitely recommend this product. It's a life changer!!

I love this stuff! My skin is so soft and youthful looking since day one of using it. It works great under makeup and seems to keep my makeup looking good and in place all day! I have a tendency to break out from any face cream, but so far, so good! Highly recommend trying it out!
Product definitely hydrates. Skin hasn't loved it though. Some breakout is occurring.
Product does what it claims. Not perfect for my skin.
Every hydroboost product has lived up to expectations and then some... please, please, please make a lip balm, I will be the happiest Neutrogena customer ever!!

I used this product once and the next day I had peeling skin on my nose and the skin around my eyes were red, scaly, and itchy. I checked the ingredients and to my knowledge have no allergies to any of them

If you have even slightly dry skin, go for the extra-dry skin version. I don't feel this one is moisturizing enough for my skin. I have to apply it twice in most areas to feel I'm getting the benefits.

I have tried so many face products and this is my favorite. Provides continuous moisture that is OBVIOUS, it doesn't leave you wondering if it is still working. I can actually see and feel the difference.
This is a good product.... absorbs fast into the skin making your face feel super soft. I don't recommend this for people with severely dry skin though. This tends to work better for oily skin types.

My skin cant breath just because of the damage caused by dryness. I was so worried with this. Tried almost everything from home remedies to dermatologist, but all in vain. Then someone told me about this wonder product. I thought of giving a chance to this product as well but guess what, its a miracle product. I feel the diffrence even after 2 3 applications. Its really an amazing product to keep your skin hydrated. Go grab this and feel the diffrence yourself.

I got this not too long ago in the travel size as I ran out of my usual moisturizer. I was drawn to it when I saw the hyaluronic acid. I really love how this product goes on so hydrating but dries so well. I also LOVE the smell. Haven't used it for long but seems promising!

I think the name says alot. The formula feels like water boosted into your skin. Its light & it sinks/absorbs right into your skin. Leaves skin feeling soft & looking 'dewy'. Not a heavy feel at all. Also leaves face looking plumper & younger. I dont have sensitive skin, but this is so light feeling, I imagine it's kind on sensitive skin. I have dry skin & it looks like I get 8 hours of sleep nightly with healthy skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have combination skin and this product works great to hydrate it. It helps eliminate dry areas but does not leave my face feeling oil. Its lightweight formulation feels refreshing on the skin and gives it a smooth and healthy feel. I really like this product and would work on both people with oilier skin and those with dry skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I just want to put this out first that I have oily skin so the reasoning behind this may just be it's meant for dryer face types however I was disappointed because I thought the gel would be good for my oily skin but instead made it irritated and dry. It does have a good consistency and smell and it works great for my grandma lol (she has dry and aging skin) so I gave it to her but overall I probably wouldn't repurchase and I had to discontinue using it.

I bought this hoping it to be a good replacement for my Clinique moisture surge, but I am allergic to the blue dye in your product, so I will have to return it. please remove the dye from the product as it is not necessary to the performance, just for looks and many people are sensitive to dyes and fragrance.

Hola. Me encantó el producto desde que lo compré en un viaje a Europa. Sin embargo, al llegar a Puerto Rico y comprar el producto nuevamente me percaté que el empaque no dice el tiempo de expiración (12 meses) y que adicional dice que tiene hyaluronic acid. ¿Por qué la diferencia? Es importante saber antes de utilizarlo. Gracias.
My 4th order. Great moisturiser and not greasy, great absorption
I've been using for 1 month and a half... this thing is wonderful
With just a couple of uses since I recently bought it and it works really good
Absorbs quickly cool feeling love it skin feels hydrated
Love the way this cream makes my face feel and it smells so good!
I have had this product for 1 month I love the product

Been using this product for about a month and I have acne prone skin. I found it to be non clogging and my skin does not have a reaction to it. I use it in combination with Neutrogena's Grapefruit facial wipes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have bought a lot of stuff from Neutrogena fairly recently. This is by far one of my favorites. I recommend it to friends and family of mine all the time. It is not oily t all and very quickly hydrates the skin. It absorbs into the skin, leaving it soft all day. This is the one product I make sure I don't run out of.

I love this product as I have been applying twice daily to address the dry patches on my face. It has hydrated the dryness enough to put on foundation and not have the dry flakes appear through the make-up. It hasn't irritated my skin or caused any break outs due to the oil free formula. I will be purchasing it again. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I had got this a few months ago and it kept burning my skin when i applied it but i didn't think it was anything bad until it kept making my hyperpigmentation worse and darker because it kept burning my skin and i didn't know that this was what was making it worse until i finished the gel & stopped using and it would also over dry my skin which was weird i would have to keep reapplying every like 30 minutes to an hour or so
I love the product but it would be great if the container was recyclable. Please consider taking care of the environment
I have been using this product for one month. My skin looks amazing. The product is reasonably priced, smells great and is effective too!
I like the way the hydro boost water gel feels to my face. It is not oily feeling and my skin doesn't feel dry.
Awesome product I can recommend to my friends and family I been using this product last couple weeks and I can notice change
I have used this before and absolutely loved the feel of my skin when I use it. Never feels greasy or heavy and moisterizes my face very well.
I love the way my face feels after applying the hydro boost water gel. I use it under my BB cream and foundation.

It seems to work well enough for a lighter moisturizer for the summer months but the smell is awful. I'm not sure why they add fragrance when the gel-cream doesn't include it, now I'm stuck with what I purchased and won't use.

If you have oily skin, this is for you! It drys quickly while perfectly making the skin feel refreshed and moisturized. I am on my 4th jar and I can not live without it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Neutrogena Hydro Boost Water Gel really is great for hydrating your skin. It has a nice gel consistency. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
NEUTROGENA® HYDRO BOOST WATER GEL IS AMAZING!! IT REALLY IS A REFRESHING EXPERIENCE. YOU REALLY NEED TO TRY THIS. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This is seriously my favorite moisturizer ever! It's not greasy and soaks into my skin versus just sitting on top. The feeling lasts all day too. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I love this product! I have very oily skin and this does not leave me feel greasy and it is not heavy! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

A little goes a long way. I use a pea size amount after washing my face, wait until it dries, and then follow up with my regular oil-free moisturizer. This instantly helps keeps moisture locked in and boots the function of my moisturizer. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I suffer from dry skin and always have trouble finding a good moisturizer. This is awesome for dry skin! Especially in the winter when your skin is a little more sensitive. Only downside it felt a little on the sticky side. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I used every high-end product on the market to help with wrinkles and sagging skin on my neck, I have also used Botox on my forehead and eye area. With HydroBoost I have found my remedy. My neck has improved dramatically and the forehead lines are becoming less of a worry. I love this product, it has replaced all other products for me! I may even be able to replace the need for Botox- amazing!

This product does wonders for dry, acne prone skin. When I initially tried it, i was surprised by how lightweight the formula was and how quickly it absorbed into my skin. This was just a random store purchase, but now it has become a staple piece in my skincare routine. I would recommend this to anyone! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

i started using this a couple days ago on my combination skin, it works good on my oily forehead and is exactly what i want for that part of my face. However, it leaves the rest of my face dry and flaky, (which it never is). it gets worse if i try to apply makeup too. i'm not sure why it's making most my face dryer than it was before. not sure what to do.

This moisturizing gel feels very light on my skin but provides the higher amount of moisture that I would expect from a thick cream. The gel works well under my foundation. I like that there is not a strong scent because I have a sensitive nose. I originally received this product in a pump bottle which I prefer to a jar that I have to stick my fingers into. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product is a lightweight, oil-free facial moisturizer with a powerful hydrater that holds up to 1,000 times its weight in water, keeping skin plumped and hydrated. It's a cool, pale-blue cream that jiggles ever so slightly when you move the jar and feels like liquid to the touch. It has a pleasantly aquatic scent—crisp and watery—and absorbs instantly. The only problem with this product is the price is very expensive. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My nieces talked me into trying this. To me it smells horrid, very chemically. But bc I liked how light and cooling it felt, I tried it for a couple of weeks, but then -bc of the smell- set it aside. In spite of closing the jar tight, I was later shocked to see that most of the product had literally evaporated! There was barely any left at the bottom of the jar! Primary ingredient, water. Water evaporates! Stinky smell at that. Total waste of my money.

This product is seriously my favorite moisturizer! I have struggled with combo skin and mild acne my entire life, I'm now nearly 30. It's hard finding a moisturizer that does it's job without causing my face to breakout. I am able to use the NEUTROGENA® Hydro Boost Water Gel daily and my skin LOVES it!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Love this product, it feels very light weight on your skin. Works very well at replacing moisture in your skin. The only problem, as far as I can tell this is not a recyclable container.. which is a bummer because it is a HUGE chunk of plastic.

THIS IS AMAZING!!! IT HAS CHANGED THE WHOLE VIEW AND FEEL OF MY SKIN!!! MY SKIN IS SMOOTH, SOFT AND ENJOYABLE TO LOOK AT IN THE MIRROR AGAIN. I LOOK FORWARD TO USING THIS EVERYDAY BC IT MAKES ME FEEL MORE CONFIDENT!!

I was very excited to try this product yet my skin has been hurting all day because of it and has become very blotchy. Odd for a product that is supposed to offer hydration. Won't be purchasing again.
It works I know it's a little pricey but it did helped with my skin give it like a week to see results [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

unsure why, but i purchased this product twice in my life time, when it first rub into skin, it does give you the sense of instantly absorb. but overnight i do find rubbery/ eraser like residue [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I'm on my like 4th jar of this and I can't get enough. Most moisturizers clog my pores and I have tried various different kinds. This was recommended by a beauty guru on youtube (Lauralee if wondering) and I have been using it ever since. I have got many others hooked on this product as well.

I have been using Neutrogena products since I was in elementary. This product Hydroboost is the most amazing product there is. I never had skin problems, but I love the cool feeling on my skin and it does keep it hydrated. I have oily skin and this product is SPOT ON for my skin type. I wish i could order a case. Please do not go off the market. I don't know what I would do if I could not get this anymore.

This is by far the best moisturizer I've used. Many moisturizers break me out because they're too oily, but this one is perfect!! I've been using this for around a year, and I will probably never use another moisturizer. The only thing I will say is that the blue dye is kind of annoying. I get that's it's trying to imitate water, but I think that this product would be even better if the harsh, chemical-y dye was taken out.

I have repurchased this cream multiple times. I enjoyed using it but the ingredients include fragrance and blue dye. It would be a really great cream if it did not include these two unnecessary ingredients. I have tried the extra-dry skin version to not have fragrance and blue dye but it is a bit too much for my skin. Please come out with a new version without fragrance and dye. I would buy it again if this change happened!

I had the same problem as reviewer NayB. The first time I used it my skin felt a bit dry. After 3 nights of use my face felt burning as soon as I put it on. I do alternate between retin A and a mild glycolic acid cream because I have extremely oily skin. I thought this would help with the dryness that occurs in the winter when I use these products. The retin A and glycolic acid cause no issues in the summer, but really needed a moisturizer for the winter. Will be on the search for something else.

Thank you, thank you, thank you, Neutrogena, for this incredible product!
